tool_description: Generate AI content at the speed of now. Create blogs, ads, product descriptions, social media posts, influencer scripts and more! Sign up at https://nowdraft.com
name: NowDraft
title: NowDraft

api_list.name: Generate AI Content
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nowdraft.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nowdraft.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Account Authorization
api_list.description:
Pull account and plan details for NowDraft
Provide your API key from [https://nowdraft.com](url)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nowdraft.p.rapidapi.com/authorization"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nowdraft.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
